item.title: Roblox: Peroxide Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Peroxide Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Peroxide
  • How to Get More Peroxide Codes
  • Peroxide Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Peroxide

There are plenty of great Roblox games that are inspired by manga and anime, but few, if any, are quite as good as Peroxide . As its name suggests, it's based on Tite Kubo's Bleach and offers players an incredibly enjoyable combat experience that Ichigo himself would be proud of. As in most other Roblox games, that experience can become even better with the help of Peroxide codes.

Players can redeem Peroxide codes to claim a ridiculous amount of free Product Essences, which they can then take to Kisuke in The City to get rerolls on every individual path. Product Essences can also be used to acquire cosmetic items, which is why fans of the game are always on the lookout for all of the latest Peroxide codes.

Updated October 17, 2025, by Tom Bowen: Another new Peroxide code just dropped. By redeeming YayAHalloweenUpdate, players can get 20 Product Essences and 10 Halloween Candy. After doing so, they should take a few moments to bookmark this page so that they can check back here regularly, as we're constantly on the lookout for new codes for Peroxide and will update the list below with any that we find.

How to Redeem Codes in Peroxide

As with similar Roblox games, the process of redeeming codes in Peroxide is relatively straightforward and does not require much knowledge or effort on the player's part. Even so, those having trouble can find step-by-step instructions on how to claim in-game rewards listed below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch Peroxide .
  • Then, if players are entering the game for the first time, they'll need to go through the tutorial.
  • Once the tutorial has been completed, in the upper left part of the screen, players should find and select the start button . It is located to the right of the chat button.
  • In the resulting menu, players should type or paste any of the active Peroxide codes listed above and then press Enter.

How to Get More Peroxide Codes

To get more Peroxide codes, players can subscribe to the developer's official Discord server, where they'll find news and updates about the game. However, the best solution is to bookmark this article, as it is updated every month.

Peroxide Tips and Tricks

Below, players will find some tips and tricks for Peroxide :

Shikai Unlocking

  • Reach level 15 as a Soul Reaper by completing quests on the board.
  • To defeat additional Hollows, visit Wake Up Mundo . It will cost 200 in-game currency.
  • Enhance stats by going to the gym near Kisuke or using agility boards.
  • After reaching level 15, meditate to unlock the Shikai.
  • Achieve B rank to use Shikai infinitely.

Resurrection Unlocking

  • Resurrection is automatically unlocked at level 15.

Use Crystals

  • Collect time relics to purchase crystals, which will enhance abilities.
  • Crystals can grant additional effects to attacks, such as setting enemies on fire.

Optimizing Stat Builds

  • Focus on combat stats rather than support stats.
  • Players need to choose stats based on their desired playstyle, whether it's a strength, vitality, or ability build.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Peroxide

Each game is special in its own way and offers an interesting gaming experience. That is why it is always fun for players to try something new. To that end, below is a list of the five best anime games like Peroxide :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Blox Fruits
  • Titan Warfare
  • Type Soul

item.title: Borderlands 4 Finally Confirms How Loot Drops Work
item.description:
Amid plenty of discussion surrounding the issue of drop rates in Borderlands 4 , creative director Graeme Timmins finally confirmed that the game's loot drops are fixed, regardless of difficulty. When Borderlands streamer Ki11er Six posted on X asking Timmins and associate creative director Grant Kao to confirm it, Timmins replied, "Dedicated drops are fixed/not influenced by difficulty/UVH."

As Borderlands 4 's most dedicated players continue to farm bosses for their favorite legendary weapons and gear, this confirmation naturally only adds fuel to the fire of the ongoing drop-rate controversy. After a recent player test exposed the legendary dedicated drop rate in Borderlands 4 to be around 5%, those who were previously unaware that difficulty has no effect on drop rates might now feel even more discouraged about their efforts.

Borderlands 4's Drop Rates Are the Same on All Difficulties

While older games like Borderlands 2 and 3 technically also used static loot tables, their Mayhem and Ultimate Vault Hunter modes effectively tied higher difficulty to better drop quality or quantity, giving players a tangible reward for playing on harder settings. But with Borderlands 4 having fixed drop rates that are unaffected by difficulty, much of the incentive to farm dedicated drops from bosses on higher difficulties Ultimate Vault Hunter 5, for example naturally goes away for some players.

This doesn't trivialize Borderlands 4 's Ultimate Vault Hunter mode, though, as there are still plenty of other reasons to take advantage of it. While the base chance to drop loot might be unchanged across difficulties, the quality, number of perks, rarity tiers, or stat ranges on those drops are reportedly improved in harder modes. In other words, players do still get better loot on higher difficulties in Borderlands 4 , even though the rate at which legendaries drop remains the same.

To be fair, as Timmins explained in his post on X, the purpose behind all of this was to ensure players weren't "forced" into higher difficulties just to have a better chance at getting the dedicated drops they were farming. This is something that games like Destiny 2 , which Borderlands 4 mimics in a lot of ways, have garnered criticism for in the past, despite their live-service, MMO model somewhat justifying it.

Nevertheless, it's understandably frustrating, especially for those players whose first game in the series is Borderlands 4 . Borderlands veterans are familiar with drop rate mechanics like this, but with Borderlands 4 being treated as an entry point for new players, they might have been looking for a more rewarding experience on the other side of difficulty.

30
8.2 /10
8 /10

Borderlands 4

item.title: How to Get All Evolution Stones in Pokemon Legends Z-A
item.description:
Evolution Stones are one of the few things that remain unchanged in Pokemon Legends: Z-A, and players can evolve a wide variety of Pokemon using these evolution items. From the classic Flareon, Vaporeon, and Jolteon, to the powerful Gallade, trainers can add these Pokemon to their teams if they get the required stone for their evolution.

In this guide, players will learn where to find all Evolution Stones in Pokemon Legends: Z-A, and where to buy more when they run out of them.

Players should not mix Evolution Stones with Mega Stones, which are traded in Quasantico Quarters for Mega Crystal Shards.

All Evolution Stones in Pokemon Legends: Z-A & Where To Buy More

Evolution Stones (often called Elemental Stones) have been part of the Pokemon games ever since Gen 1 hit the stores back in 1996. With the progression of the franchise into later Generations, more Pokemon were added, and of course, more Evolution Stones saw the light of day. Today, there are a total of ten Evolution Stones, and these are the ones that can be found in Pokemon Legends Z-A :

  • Fire Stone
  • Thunder Stone
  • Water Stone
  • Leaf Stone
  • Ice Stone
  • Dusk Stone
  • Dawn Stone
  • Moon Stone
  • Sun Stone
  • Shiny Stone

These Stones can be obtained in one of two ways: The first is by finding them or obtaining them as rewards for Secondary Missions , the second is by purchasing them from the Stone Emporium, located in Vernal Avenue, close to Wild Area 1. Players should take note of this zone, as it is also close to an Eevee Spawning Spot, the only Pokemon that uses stones to evolve in various forms.

Curiously, players can also acquire Jaw Fossil , Sail Fossil , and Ancient Amber in the Stone Emporium, so they are going to be able to farm Fossil Pokemon to get that prized pink Shiny Aerodactyl, or the cool blue Shiny Tyrunt.

All Pokemon That Evolve with Stones in Legends Z-A

From the classic Eeveelutions that derive from the cutesy Eevee, to the mysterious Froslass, here is a complete list of all the Pokemon that require a Stone to evolve in Pokemon Legends Z-A :

item.title: Roblox: Noobs War Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Noobs War is an unusual combination of tycoon and strategic war simulator, where you need to earn money and conquer other territories. To earn money, you need as much territory as possible, and for this, you need a strong army to compete for land with others.

As in other Roblox games, in Noobs War , you can redeem codes, and this is exactly what will drive your progress. A few seconds spent on activation will bring you decent capital and the opportunity to build a strategy with the army you buy with confidence.

All Noobs War Codes

Working Noobs War Codes

  • SHUTDOWNSORRY - Redeem this code to get 30 minutes of 2x Money.
  • 1MVisits - Redeem this code to get 100,000 Money.
  • MINIGUN - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Money.

Expired Noobs War Codes

There are currently no expired Noobs War codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Noobs War codes is the easiest way to earn Money in this Roblox game and will be especially useful if you have just started playing. Both currency and boosters will greatly facilitate your gameplay, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Noobs War

Everyone wants to get rewards from Noobs War codes, but not everyone knows how to do it. We are here to help you, so we have created simple and clear instructions on how to activate Noobs War codes, if you are not familiar with the steps:

  • Launch Noobs War .
  • Look at the upper left corner of the screen. There will be a button with a gear icon. Click on it.
  • This will open the Settings menu. Here, scroll to the bottom to find the redemption section.
  • The redemption section will contain an input field and a green Claim button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above active codes into the input field.
  • Finally, click on the green Claim button to submit your request for rewards.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Noobs War Codes

Another way to get new promo codes is to follow the official Noobs War pages on social media. Developers often hide rewards in posts, announcements, or holiday publications, so checking regularly will help you grab rewards as soon as they are released:

  • Official Noobs War Roblox group.
  • Official Noobs War game page.
  • Official Noobs War Discord server.
Roblox

item.title: Roblox: Stop the Zombie Plants Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Stop the Zombie Plants is a unique time killer that combines Brainrot, tower defense, and tycoon, so this Roblox title has a lot to surprise you with. To protect yourself from zombie attackers, you need to grow Brainrot characters, but this costs a bunch of Coins.

Fortunately, in Stop the Zombie Plants , you can redeem codes that offer both Coins and seeds for spawning characters. So, if you don't mind another Cappuccino Assassino defending your base, be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

All Stop the Zombie Plants Codes

Working Stop the Zombie Plants Codes

  • NEW - Redeem this code to get Cappuccino Assassino.
  • 100liKES - Redeem this code to get Cappuccino Assassino.
  • 1K_LiKes - Redeem this code to get Cappuccino Assassino.

Expired Stop the Zombie Plants Codes

There are currently no expired Stop the Zombie Plants codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Stop the Zombie Plants codes is a great opportunity to expand your army and fill empty spaces in your base with new units. It won't take you long, but each code has an expiration date after which it no longer offers rewards, so hurry up.

How to Redeem Codes for Stop the Zombie Plants

Redeeming Stop the Zombie Plants codes is not difficult, but there are so many buttons and options in the UI that it can be difficult to find the one you need. If you encounter this or any other problem when redeeming codes in this Roblox game, try following the steps in our guide:

  • Launch Stop the Zombie Plants .
  • Pay attention to the upper right corner of the screen. There will be several buttons placed in a row. Among them, interact with the last one, with the gear icon.
  • This will open the Settings menu. Here, at the bottom, you will find the redemption section, which will contain an input field and a yellow OK button below it. Now, enter one of the active codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Finally, click on the yellow OK button to submit your request for rewards.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Stop the Zombie Plants Codes

If you want to search for more promo codes, you can wait for this guide to be updated. However, to simplify this task, we have found and compiled a list of links to all the official resources of the game that will publicly post new codes:

  • Official Stop the Zombie Plants Roblox group.
  • Official Stop the Zombie Plants game page.
  • Official Stop the Zombie Plants Discord server.
